_sText:
I made this RC Helicopter for fun maps it includes a screen with at the button so people can see where the the helicopter is flying
Thought i tried to make the controls work proper i couldn't they are mirrored but they work fine when you get used to them.
just the default keys ASWD and left click to go up.
Next my next release i will try to include a gun or make it able to drop bombs. 
:) have fun and don't forget the credits :)
